professional_summary: Automation Developer with hands-on experience in Python-based test automation, AI agent workflows, and RPA. Skilled in developing and testing developer interfaces, APIs, and multi-agent systems. Experienced in building mock services, integrating tests into CI/CD pipelines, and validating AI model outputs. Proven ability to collaborate across technical and non-technical teams, with a focus on quality, reliability, and continuous improvement in AI-driven environments.
cv_job_experience:
August 2025 - Present
  Self-Directed Projects & AI/Agentic Automation Development and Cybersecurity
  • Developed AI-powered automation workflows using LangChain to orchestrate LLM-based tasks, including note rewriting and automatic flashcard creation.
  • Built and tested agentic automation systems for personal productivity, demonstrating real-world AI agent behavior and workflow integration.
  • Practiced web exploitation and security testing through HTB Certified Web Exploitation Specialist course, applying security principles to automation design.

January 2023 – August 2025
  Software Developer & Support Manager, Digia Finland Oy
  • Designed and deployed Python-based RPA solutions, including API integrations and database interactions, to automate enterprise workflows.
  • Maintained a large-scale enterprise file transfer/transform system, ensuring data accuracy and secure handling of sensitive information.
  • Collaborated with technical and business teams to refine automation logic, improve scalability, and validate API functionality.
  • Supported citizen developers in automation projects, including documentation and troubleshooting.
  • Rebuilt and managed client relationships through technical demonstrations and solution proposals.

May 2017 - August 2021 (Summers while studying for B.sC in Mech. Eng.)
  Mechanical Engineering Trainee, Wärtsilä Oy
  • Conducted engineering calculations and system tuning for engine projects.
  • Managed technical documentation and supported installation and calibration tasks across international client projects.

Leadership Experience
  Finnish Army Reserves (Dragsviikin Maakuntajoukkue)
    • Led a platoon of 30 personnel in high-pressure environments, managing training, logistics, and operations.
    • Developed strategic thinking and problem-solving skills applicable to cross-functional technical teams.
skills: Python, pytest, unittest, mock, asyncio, REST APIs, GraphQL, WebSockets, Docker, CI/CD, Git, version control, API testing, SDK testing, UI testing, data schemas, OpenAPI, prompt engineering, RAG, vector databases, LangChain, LangGraph, multi-agent system architecture, LLM orchestration, AI agents, agentic automation, process optimization, Pandas, SQL, Microsoft Azure, AWS, Bash, JavaScript/TypeScript (Fullstack), Selenium, PyAutoGUI, N8N, HuggingFace, Ollama, security testing, HTB Certified Web Exploitation Specialist
key_achievements:
• Delivered multiple full-cycle automation projects with measurable efficiency gains, including client-facing RPA solutions.
• Built and tested agentic workflows using LangChain for personal productivity, demonstrating LLM orchestration and task chaining.
• Mentored citizen developers in automation practices, improving team-wide adoption of scripting and workflow tools.
